titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons of the City of London, in Common-councell assembled. To the Right Honourable the Lords and Commons assembled in High Court of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, Printer to the Honorable City of London,

notesStmt.note: On the quartering of the Army in the city.
The replies of the Lords and Commons are dated 1 Dec. 1647.
In another state of the title page the title continues "With the answer ..", and imprint is dated 1 Dec. 1647.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nov: 2d"; "Nov" has been partially erased and replaced by "Decb".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
